Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are considered to be one of the most important clean, distributed resources.
Titulo: Data-driven nonlinear control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: However, SOFCs present a challenging control problem owing to their slow dynamics, nonlinearity and tight operating constraints.
Titulo: Data-driven nonlinear control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: A novel data-driven nonlinear control strategy was proposed to solve the SOFC control problem by combining a virtual reference feedback tuning (VRFT) method and support vector machine.
Titulo: Data-driven nonlinear control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: In order to fulfill the requirement for fuel utilization and control constraints, a dynamic constraints unit and an anti-windup scheme were adopted.
Titulo: Data-driven nonlinear control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: In addition, a feedforward loop was designed to deal with the current disturbance.
Titulo: Data-driven nonlinear control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Detailed simulations demonstrate that the fast response of fuel flow for the current demand disturbance and zero steady error of the output voltage are both achieved.
Titulo: Data-driven nonlinear control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Meanwhile, fuel utilization is kept almost within the safe region.
Titulo: Data-driven nonlinear control of a solid oxide fuel cell system
